Text: A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man is the first novel by Irish writer James Joyce.
Triplets:<James Joyce
Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man
1:
--------------------
Text: A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man:  A Künstlerroman in a modernist style, it traces the religious and intellectual awakening of young Stephen Dedalus, a fictional alter ego of Joyce and an allusion to Daedalus, the consummate craftsman of Greek mythology.
Triplets:<A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man
A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man
3:
--------------------
Text: A Portrait of the Artist as a Young Man:  The work uses techniques that Joyce developed more fully in "Ulysses" (1922) and "Finnegans Wake" (1939).
Triplets:<Joyce
